item.content:encoded: […] it to Joseph to find (and link to) all the cool stuff… One of his recent “del.icio.us links” is a 3.5 minute video, RSS in Plain English. It’s a gentle introduction to RSS and […]

item.title: By: Baron Turner
item.dc:creator: Baron Turner
item.description: May I be so bold... RSS is so powerful but little used. The key is ensure that is the feeds produced have an outgoing link included - this can generally only be done by utilising the CDATA tag - which allows all kinds of constructs. We regularly publish RSS feeds of entire product ranges of our clients which beautifully allow deep links to every page of our site - just once per page, for every page. Every time it happens it brings a smile to my face. Regards Baron Turner <a href="http://www.turnerdow.com"/ rel="nofollow">Search Engine Optimisation</a>
item.content:encoded:
May I be so bold… RSS is so powerful but little used. The key is ensure that is the feeds produced have an outgoing link included – this can generally only be done by utilising the CDATA tag – which allows all kinds of constructs. We regularly publish RSS feeds of entire product ranges of our clients which beautifully allow deep links to every page of our site – just once per page, for every page. Every time it happens it brings a smile to my face.
Regards
Baron Turner
Search Engine Optimisation
